question: [File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/token_mutation_event.rs] [Struct: TokenMutationEvent] [Unicode handling] Do the String fields properly handle all Unicode code points including those in supplementary planes, or could invalid Unicode cause issues in event processing?
